the Harris Committee. Despite the HAEB's nervousness, I feel the
letter will be timed better than any other and thus will give our
state's presentation added impact.
The truth of the matter is, Governor Swainson was the first
governor to stand behind his state's ETV stations-for it was back
in mid-March that Armand Hunter included the governor's proclamation
of educational broadcasting month in his testimony J
again, congratulations to you and to Jim Tintera for helping
the Governor so swiftly and so well...and warmest thanks from our
sixteen Detroit-area institutions for your highly effective leader-
shipj
